Class FindColorOperator

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    For handling color finding operations within the script.

    Joonas

    • Constructor Detail

      • FindColorOperator

        public FindColorOperator(HashMap<String,Integer> variablesAndValues,
                         ArrayList<String> colorPalette,
                         frmLogger myLogger)
        The constructor.
        Parameters:
        variablesAndValues - A HashMap containing all the variables and their values.

        myLogger - The error logger.

    • Method Detail

      • handleFindColorAsParameter

        public String handleFindColorAsParameter(String commandLine)
        When any color finding operation is used from the class ColorOperator it needs to be processed here.
        Parameters:
        commandLine - The command line containing the color finding operation
        Returns:
        The coordinates as String. Format "x y" t. ex. "50 100"

      • isValidHex

        public boolean isValidHex(String hex)
        Checks if the given parameter is a valid number in hex format. For example #FFFFFF and #000000 are valid.
        Parameters:
        hex - The String to check
        Returns:
        True if String is a hex number, false if not.
